title: Crashing Game After Pressing Keys
body:
Hello,
Well, this is basically what happened: I went into a game (it loaded like normal), and I pressed the "Y" key for camera adjustment once the game was fully loaded. Then, the game instantly crashed. I just brushed it off as just a bug with the camera key or something so I reconnected. I came back in again, and I tried to press the "Enter" key to try to apologize for my teammates. Unfortunately, there was a crash too. I've reconnected multiple times and tried multiple keys, but I came to a consensus that there was something wrong with the game. I checked the recent crash reports, and they say something about RADS being unable to open specific files because "it's not in the manifest." Yes, I updated my keyboard drivers. Does anyone have any solution to this at all?

replies.body: I have the same problem T_T
Was there a specific crash error that popped up when this happened? Maybe it was a bugsplat error, the one with Ziggs on it? I'll need a few more details to understand exactly what happened.
